Text: New domestic manufacturing companies will be taxed at 15% to attract investments and give thrust to the Make-in-India initiative.
Cause: to attract investments and give thrust to the Make-in-India initiative.
Effect: New domestic manufacturing companies will be taxed at 15%
Sentence: <e2>New domestic manufacturing companies will be taxed at 15%</e2> <e1>to attract investments and give thrust to the Make-in-India initiative.</e1>
